questions.question: Where should the emergency medical kit normally be stowed?
options: Near any passenger qualified to administer drugs

questions.question: On which aircraft do CVRs need to record for 2 hours?
On which aircraft can the FDR recording time be reduced to 10 hours?
Which aircraft must be fitted with ACAS II?
When must flight deck operating crew be on oxygen in a pressurized aircraft?
options: The entire flight time when the aircraft is above 13000 ft
The entire flight time when the cabin is above 10000 ft
The entire flight time when the cabin is above 13000 ft
Flight deck crew do not need oxygen in a pressurized aircraft
questions.solution: The entire flight time when the cabin is above 13000 ft

questions.question: When deciding on how much oxygen is required for a particular flight, what must the crew allow for?
options: Oxygen for 100% of the passenger seat fit for cabin alt above 15000 ft
Oxygen for 100% of the passengers for the entire time the cabin is between 10-13 000 ft
Oxygen for 30% of the passengers for the entire time the cabin of a pressurized aircraft is above 14000 ft
Oxygen for all passengers and all crew for the entire flight above 12000 ft
questions.solution: Oxygen for 30% of the passengers for the entire time the cabin of a pressurized aircraft is above 14000 ft

questions.question: How many ELTs must be fitted to an aircraft with 19 passenger seats?
options: 2, one of which must be automatic if registered after July 2008
1, which must be automatic if registered after July 2008
ELTs are for life rafts only, not aircraft
questions.solution: 1, which must be automatic if registered after July 2008
